post.body: @matarua AWESOME Tshirt design!!!!!! http://urltea.com/285a
thanks for donating an SSL cert to BarCamp! http://tinyurl.com/yu4ulw
We've migrated the wiki to PBWiki 2.0 Hurrah! Go take a look and let us know what you think: http://barcamp.org
Two new articles about BarCamp in India: http://moourl.com/tl2jt and http://moourl.com/slxyg
Great article on PBS about BarCamp! http://tinyurl.com/2j7tyy
Looks like BarCampAtlanta Day 1 was a big success! http://flickr.com/photos/tags/barcampatlanta thanks for the tip @stammy!
Check out Kragen's extensive write up of BarCampBuenosAires: http://tinyurl.com/222e49
Good write up of BarCampBuenosAires -- looks like we're hitting South America! http://tinyurl.com/235h6x
It's totally BarCampOrlando today! http://barcamp.org/BarCampOrlando
Sweet! BarCamp coming to New Orleans! http://barcamp.org/BarCampNOLA
GreenDevCamp anyone? http://barcamp.org/GreenDevCamp
Feedback on early draft of BarCampBlock logo por favor? http://tinyurl.com/2hgvme
The *first ever* BarCamp is being planned in Russia!! Check it out! http://barcamp.org/BarCampKazan
Oh, and if you're not doing anything and don't plan on doing anything, try NihilCamp: http://barcamp.org/NihilCamp
Wow, that's like the best logo so far! http://barcamp.blaz.com.br/evento/floripa
Oh, the places you'll go. The *camp movement never ceases to amaze: http://barcamp.org/SkeptiCampColorado1
BarCamp Chicago this coming weekend! http://barcampchicago.com/
BarCampSanDiego this weekend! http://barcamp.org/BarCampSanDiego
MobileCampNYC going off tomorrow from 9-6pm at 157 William Street (NW corner of William & Ann Streets), 13th floor!
ANN: Facebook Party/BarCampMixer at the Playboy Club at the Palm @10pm. Pw: facebook.
